item.text: High school, - cemetery My youth - Pedant teachers And heavy exams ... And today you are High school, - cemetery My youth! High school, - cemetery With long corridors - Today is no longer me And my mind hurts ... Nothing I ever want - High school, - cemetery With long corridors ... High school, - cemetery My youth - The world you gave me In heavy rains, So blasted ... High school, - cemetery My youth!
